title: Bloodborne's 744-Page Complete Guide Is Steeply Discounted This Weekend

body:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.
  
              
          
                                                                                                                                                               From Software fans can pick up Bloodborne's Complete Guide for $42 at Amazon until October 13. To get this deal, click on the coupon on the store page; the price will drop from $60 to $42 after you add it to your cart. The 30% discount is one of the best we've seen since Future Press published the 744-page official strategy guide last October.The Complete Edition is roughly 200 pages longer than the 2017 Collector's Edition Guide. This is because the Complete Edition also includes The Old Hunters expansion, which received its own 224-page physical guide in 2015. Along with everything you need to 100% the base game and DLC, the guide includes concept art, a deep dive into the lore of Yharnam, an interview with director Hidetaka Miyazaki, and a reference index for in-game lore.                                                                                                                                               You could use some of the money you're saving on the recently released Bloodborne: The Death of Sleep Deluxe Edition, the recently released hardcover edition of the first Bloodborne graphic novel. It's one of several Bloodborne and From Software books in Amazon's B2G1 Free Sale (ends October 11). You can also get Bloodborne's 1-3 Slipcase Box Set, Dark Souls: The Complete Collection, and multiple art books.B2G1 Free Bloodborne Graphic NovelsVol. 1-3 Box Set -- $28 ($50)Vol. 1: The Death of Sleep Deluxe -- $25Vol. 1: The Death of Sleep -- $16.15 ($18)Vol. 4: The Veil Torn Asunder -- $18Vol. 6: The Bleak Dominion -- $16.73 ($18)B2G1 Free Dark Souls BooksDark Souls Comic Collection -- $24 ($35)Dark Souls: Design Works -- $37.19 ($40)Dark Souls II: Design Works -- $49B2G1 Free From Software MangaElden Ring Vol. 1 -- $11 ($13)Sekiro Side Story -- $11 ($15)                                 Bloodborne Complete Edition Guide (Hardcover)                                                                $42 (was $60) with coupon                                                                                                                                                                                    Bloodborne's Complete Edition Guide has a detailed primer to prepare newcomers for Yharnam's many threats. Mainline objectives are outlined and accompanied by illustrated maps with annotations to help you uncover the many secrets hidden across the interconnected regions in the base game and The Old Hunters expansion.In addition to mandatory objectives, the guide tackles all of Bloodborne's optional side content. Most notably, it has a thorough section on the ever-changing Chalice Dungeons to help you unlock some of the game's best weapons and loot. You can also use the guidebook as a reference manual, as it contains a full bestiary with in-depth analysis on the monsters who want to keep you in the nightmare. Along with the bestiary, you can reference the weapon and gear catalog to maximize your build's potential.The book's final chapter, Hunter's Appendices, helps you track your progress toward 100% by cataloging every character, shop, special enemies, and more. The text is accompanied by work of From Software's concept artists, making this the ultimate companion for fans of the game. Even if you don't need a traditional "guide," there's enough here in terms of art and lore to make it a worthy addition to your shelf.Beyond the walkthrough, reference catalogs, and annotated maps found in the main chapters, Bloodborne's Complete Edition Guide comes with a "bonus chest" featuring the following: Exclusive interview with Hidetaka MiyazakiThe Story of Yharnam - background info on the game worldThe Art of The Old Hunters: 20 pages of concept artLore Index with important reference notes on YharnamNote: This guidebook is technically called Bloodborne Complete Guide 25th Anniversary Edition. The anniversary it's referring to is for Future Press. The publisher gave the reissue of Dark Souls Trilogy Compendium the same 25th Anniversary Edition moniker.                      From Software Official GuidebooksFrom Software official strategy guidesArmored Core 6 Pilot's Manual -- $45Bloodborne Complete Guide -- $42 ($60)Dark Souls Trilogy Compendium -- Sold outElden Ring Nightreign Guide -- $45 | Feb. 27, 2026Elden Ring: Books of Knowledge Vol. 1 -- $50Elden Ring: Books of Knowledge Vol. 2 -- $50Elden Ring: Books of Knowledge Vol. 3 -- $44.54Physical guidebooks aren't all that common these days, and they generally double as art books and/or have a collectible component to their designs. From Software fans who like strategy guides are quite fortunate, as the studio consistently collaborates with Future Press to produce gorgeous guides for its games. Future Press has released three Elden Ring guides in its Books of Knowledge series. A guide for Elden Ring Nightreign was originally slated to launch in September, but it has been pushed back to February 2026. From Software fans can also get Armored Core 6's Pilot Manual for $45.From Software Art BooksDark Souls: Design Works (Udon Entertainment)Unfortunately, the English edition of Udon Entertainment's Bloodborne Official Artworks is sold out, but you can get the Japanese edition for $41.80 from a third-party seller on Amazon. Elden Ring's first two art books are also difficult to find in stock, but you can preorder Shadow of the Erdtree's art book at Amazon. Meanwhile, art books for Dark Souls and Dark Souls II are included in Amazon's Buy Two, Get One Free Sale (through October 11).Dark Souls: Design Works -- $37.19 ($40) | B2G1 FreeDark Souls II: Design Works -- $49 | B2G1 FreeDark Souls III: Design Works -- $50Elden Ring: Official Art Book Volume I -- Sold outElden Ring: Official Art Book Volume II -- Sold outElden Ring: official Art Book Volume III -- $55.79 ($60) | January 6, 2026Bloodborne Official Artworks -- Sold out  Japanese Edition -- $41.80Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice: Official Artworks -- $36.44 ($50)Bloodborne & Dark Souls Graphic NovelsFrom Software Graphic Novels                                                                                                                                               Bloodborne's official graphic novel adaptation has six volumes. As mentioned, the new Deluxe Edition of Volume 1 is eligible for Amazon's B2G1 Free Sale. A box set with the first three books is also in the promotion, and the box set for Volumes 4-6 will be published October 14 for $50. That said, it's worth noting Volumes 4 and 6 are included in the B2G1 promotion, too.Bloodborne Graphic Novels at AmazonBloodborne Vol. 1-3 Box Set -- $28 ($50) | B2G1 FreeBloodborne Vol. 4-6: Box Set -- $50 | October 14Vol. 1: The Death of Sleep Deluxe -- $25 | B2G1 FreeVol. 1: The Death of Sleep -- $16.15 ($18) | B2G1 FreeVol. 2: The Healing Thirst -- $16 ($18)Vol. 3: A Song of Crows -- $15.85 ($18)Vol. 4: The Veil Torn Asunder -- $18 | B2G1 FreeVol. 5: Lady of the Lanterns -- $16.73 ($18)Vol. 6: The Bleak Dominion -- $16.73 ($18) | B2G1 FreeDark Souls Graphic Novels & Manga at Amazon                                                                                                                                               From Software's Dark Souls series also has an official graphic novel adaptation as well as a manga that debuted last year. Dark Souls: The Complete Collection, an omnibus with the first four volumes and the Tales of Ember short story anthology, is available for $24.28 (was $35) and B2G1 Free at Amazon. A new series from Titan Comics, Mother of Mourning, releases in paperback next June.Dark Souls: The Complete Collection -- $24 ($35) | B2G1 FreeThe Breath of Andolus, Winter's Spite, Legends of the Flame, Tales of Ember, and Age of FireDark Souls Vol. 1-3 Slipcase Set -- $28.49 ($50)  Includes The Breath of Andolus, Winter's Spite, Legends of the FlameVol. 1: The Breath of Andolus -- $15.85 ($18)Vol. 1: The Breath of Andolus: Artist's Edition -- $30Vol. 2: Winter's Spite -- $17.69 ($18)Vol. 3: Legends of the Flame -- $16.46 ($18)Vol. 4: The Age of Fire -- $18Vol. 5: The Willow King -- $11.50 ($18)Dark Souls: Mother of Mourning -- $18 | June 30, 2026Dark Souls Manga & Prose Novel:Dark Souls: Redemption, Vol. 1 (Manga) -- $14 ($15)Dark Souls: Redemption, Vol. 2 (Manga) -- $15Dark Souls: Masque of Vindication (Fiction Novel) -- $20.25 ($25)Elden Ring: The Road to the Erdtree MangaSpeaking of From Software manga, Elden Ring has a manga adaptation, too, but it's decidedly different from the game, as it's a comedy. By

                  GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.
                Battlefield 6 includes a full campaign with 30 collectible dog tags to find. There are 10 rewards you can earn just by collecting these mission collectibles. In this guide, we'll show you all the rewards you can earn and how to unlock them for yourself.If you need help finding the dog tags for each mission, we have a full Battlefield campaign collectibles guide to walk you through each one. This list also included a bonus collectible needed for getting the "End of an Era" achievement/trophy in Battlefield 6.Make sure to check out our Battlefield 6 guide hub for tips and tricks on playing, including the best settings, recommended loadouts, and a full overview of the Battlefield 6 class system.Dead Center - Dog tagThis dog tag can be unlocked by picking up all three collectibles in the first campaign mission called Always Faithful.Danger Ahead - Player card backgroundThis background can be unlocked by collecting all three dog tags in the second mission called The Rock.Elite Raider - Player card iconThis icon can be unlocked by picking up all three dog tags in the third campaign mission called Operation Gladius.Urban Sprawl - Character skin (Recon)This Urban Spawl character skin is unlocked for the Recon class by picking up all four dog tags in the fourth campaign mission called Night Raid.Gridlock - Character skin (Support)A Gridlock character skin is unlocked for the Support class by picking up all three dog tags in the fifth campaign mission called No Sleep.Career XP boosterLevel up faster using this career XP boost for double XP. This can be earned by picking up all the dog tags in the sixth campaign mission called Moving Mountains. This double XP reward doesn't say how long it lasts.Canopy Drop - Vehicle camoThis green vehicle camo can be unlocked by picking up all two dog tags in the seventh campaign mission titled Nile Guard.Gridlock - Character skin (Assault)A Gridlock character skin for the Assault class can be unlocked by finding all four dog tags in the eighth campaign mission called Operation Ember Strike.Urban Spawl - character skin (Engineer)An Urban Spawl character skin for the Engineer class can be unlocked during the final campaign mission called Always Forward.Winner Take All - Dog tagRetrieving all 30 dog tags will unlock this dog tag as a tenth and final reward for the Battlefield campaign collectibles.

title: Final Fantasy 7 Remake & Rebirth Twin Pack Preorders Live At Amazon

body:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.
  
              
          
                                                                                                                                                               Two of the best RPGs on PS5 will soon be available in a new $60 bundle with the Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade & Rebirth Twin Pack, which is set to arrive on December 4. This physical edition bundle is only releasing for PS5--which isn't surprising, given Final Fantasy VII Rebirth is currently only available on PS5 and PC--but it looks to be a convenient way to grab the first two entries in the planned remake trilogy on Sony's console. Preorders for the Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade and Rebirth Twin Pack first went live at Square Enix's online store, but are now also available at Amazon.It's worth noting you can still find Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade for $40 and Rebirth for $50 at Amazon. Obviously, the Twin Pack is a much more affordable option, but buying the standalone versions is worth it if you can't wait any longer to dive in. The standalone version of Final Fantasy VII Rebirth also comes with an Amazon-exclusive DualSense controller skin, featuring both Cloud and Sephiroth.While the dual pack is PS5-exclusive, Switch 2 and Xbox players will soon be able to kick off the trilogy when Final Fanasy VII Remake Intergrade finally launches on both platforms early next year. The physical Switch 2 edition launches January 22, 2026, and includes a bunch of early bird bonuses if you preorder, including a booster pack from the Final Fantasy-themed Magic: The Gathering set that released earlier this year (and has become much harder to track down). Check our preorder guide for more information. The digital Xbox Series X|S version also launches January 22, 2026, and Square Enix has confirmed that Final Fantasy VII Rebirth and the still-untitled third game in the trilogy will also come with Switch 2 and Xbox in the future.Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade - Switch 2 Edition Preorders                                                                                                                                               Final Fantasy fans will also be glad to hear that the HD port of the original PS1 Final Fantasy is finally getting a physical Switch release in North America alongside Final Fantasy VIII Remastered and Final Fantasy IX. The Final Fantasy VII + Final Fantasy VIII Remastered Twin Pack and Final Fantasy IX HD Switch 1 editions both launch for $40 apiece on December 9, just a few days after the new PS5 FFVII Remake Twin Pack. Both releases include the full game data on the cartridges and are playable on both the original Switch and Switch 2.
